title: YouTube Music for Wear OS rolling out Wi-Fi and LTE streaming
content:
In addition to a new Recently Played tile, YouTube Music for Wear OS will soon let you stream songs over data/cellular instead of having to download songs, albums, or playlists ahead of time. 

more…

The post YouTube Music for Wear OS rolling out Wi-Fi and LTE streaming appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: YouTube Music for Wear OS will let you stream songs over Wi-Fi and LTE instead of having to download everything ahead of time...
